description:
OpenRCT2 is a fan-made, open-source reimplementation of the classic simulation game. It faithfully preserves 
the original game while introducing modern improvements and expanded features. Players can construct intricate 
roller coasters, manage finances, and build the park of their dreams!

0.1.13-beta.title: Is this Going to Fix the Network Issues? Probably Not

v0.1.11-beta.description: There's an icon on the Launcher now!
v0.1.11-beta.title: I guess I should make new releases instead of constantly changing the previous one

v0.1.12-beta.title: Is this Going to Fix the Network Issues? Probably Not

v0.1.13-beta.description: Work continues slowly as I prepare to leave to Antarctica, but at least this release should fix the issues with Wacky Worlds and Time Twister Parks
v0.1.13-beta.title: *Insert Clever Title Here

v0.1.14-beta.description:
When the sun sets, the only thing to keep me busy through the winter will be work and code. Until then, here's an update!

-Better location names implemented. "Green_5" instead of "Open_RCT2_19"
-Improved Colorblind mode
-Furry traps are broken :( They'll be fixed eventually with an update to OpenRCT2
-A Tutorial was started! Ignore the fact that it's totally unfinished right now.
-No changes to network code! I'm not very good at network code...
-I can't remember anything else off the top of my head, go ask past Colby for those updates.
v0.1.14-beta.title: Straight Outta Antarctica

v0.1.15-beta.description:
I'm freezing over here, and the sun hasn't even set yet! Have a release, made with our precious free time. (Antarctica really needs to end these terrible 6 day workweeks with salary. Terrible deal out here.)

**This update will break old saves! Only use it on new generations and saves!**

-Save games now check and warn the player if the file doesn't line up with the Archipelago game
-Added options for every item to be added to arbitrary scenarios. Now you can live your dream of building multi-dimensional coasters in Forest Frontiers!
-Removed ability to purchase items from the shop while paused
-Revamped item tracking under the hood to line up with Standard Archipelago Practice
-Fixed glitch where having a furry trap unlocked will prevent a new game from starting
-Finally fixed the bug where multiple copies of an item would occasionally be unlocked, leading to errors down the line
-Mild changes to certain buttons on Spam Traps
-Fixed rare issues where stalls would occasionally cause the generator to crash
-Check out this cool song I wrote!
v0.1.15-beta.title: IT'S COLD!!!!!

v0.1.16-beta.description:
Has anyone ever told you that Linux is superior to Windows in essentially every way? I've gotten to talk to actual penguins about it now!

**This update will break old saves! Only use it on new generations and saves!**

- New options for displays in the unlock shop! Now you can see if an item is progression!
- New options for minimum ride length and total guests for prereqs in the unlock shop
- Fixed bug with LSM Launched Coaster not unlocking
- Parks will now always correctly identify themselves, even if the language is not English - US
- Check out this other cool song I wrote! 🎶
v0.1.16-beta.title: Preaching to the Penguins

v0.1.17-beta.description:
**THIS IS NOT THE LATEST RELEASE. DON'T BELIEVE GITHUB! MICROSOFT IS CANCER! UPGRADE TO LINUX! FIND THE LATEST RELEASE AT https://github.com/Crazycolbster/rollercoaster-tycoon-randomizer/releases/latest**

While Everybody back home is enjoying the start of spring, I'm watching the sun slowly creep closer to it's 3 month disappearance. This scares me.

**This update will break old saves! Only use it on new generations and saves!
You will need to replace the old Archipelago Madness scenarios, as new rides have been added to OpenRCT2 since their original creation.**

- Added EnergyLink support! Now you can send your profits to other players!
- The game will now check its version and show a warning if the versions don't match. 
- Improved the in game !!commands
- Changed Skips to require the ride be unlocked before skipping. This will help prevent breaking logic
- Finished the in-game tutorial
- Added new Loan Shark Trap. This increases your loan based on the number of rides and stalls in your park.
- Added an option to balance guest count requirements for the unlock shop
- Wow! Another cool song!
- Fixed the furry convention trap (For now)
v0.1.17-beta.title: [NOT THE LATEST RELEASE] Brace Yourself, Winter is Coming

v0.1.18-beta.description:
It has happened. The sun has set for the final time. It won't return until August. I stand before the mountains of madness.

On the surface, mostly just bug fixes, but under the hood, we're starting to get same-world multiplayer ready! Same-world multiplayer scares me...

**This update will break old saves! Only use it on new generations and saves!
You will need to replace the old Archipelago Madness scenarios, as new rides have been added to OpenRCT2 since their original creation.**

-New Versions of Archipelago Madness!
-Original Versions have slight land ownership issue fixed. You'll want to replace the old ones again.
-Furry traps *should* always work now
-Fixed incorrect ride lists on Loopy Landscape scenarios
-New variants of Archipelago Madness better optimized for shorter games
-Tweaked the default settings for minimum ride length and minimum guest counts, decreasing the total guests requirement maximum for any game to 1000, and the default to 400.
-Upped the default number of skips to 7, and the maximum allowed to 100 for marathon length games.
-Changed phrasing of minimum guests to reflect that this is per ride, not total.
-Fixed monopoly mode not properly setting tiles for purchase.
-Fixed monopoly mode not checking ownership properly
-New Spam Trap messages/effects (Would you fall for the schmuck bait?)
-I keep writing awesome music! (This file is only for listening and has no bearing on OpenRCT2 or Archipelago. But you should totally tell me how great it is in the Discord. I have a vanity quota to fill)
v0.1.18-beta.title: The Sun Is Gone

v0.1.19-beta.description:
The sun does not exist.
The sun has never existed.
I shall return with a new sun soon.

**This update will break your save! Only use it with new save files!**
- New option to force unique rides to be in other players worlds or in your own. Thanks cjmang!
- Added fireworks option! Since OpenRCT2 doesn't have fireworks by default, I improvised. Don't use this if you want to keep playing your park afterwards!
- New advertisements on the Spam Trap! Maybe clicking the button will do something?
- With the new Launcher, added description and one-liners to the description.
- Fixed bug where ineligible tiles were still required to be purchased in Monopoly mode.
- Fixed bug where Monopoly mode would color your park in ugly surface tiles.
- The RUIN PARK spam ad no longer glitches tiles in parks with few surface colors available.
- Hypothetically fixed the links on the website
- Check out this cool song! (I wrote this for a D&D game! This doesn't have anything to do with the plugin, but you should tell me how great it sounds! I have a vanity quota to fill.)
v0.1.19-beta.title: Midwinter Madness

v0.1.2-beta.title: I guess I should make new releases instead of constantly changing the previous one

v0.1.20-beta.description:
After a long, cold, winter, I have finally returned to the land of potatoes! And I'm still not done with this. Maybe we'll officially release someday! Until then, have a beta release.

**This update will break old saves! Only use it on new generations and saves!
You will need to replace the old Archipelago Madness scenarios, as new rides have been added to OpenRCT2 since their original creation.**

- Added awards! With optional settings enabled, awards will now include checks. Due to the haphazard nature of awards, these will never be progression.
- Added archipelago.json to keep the .apworld working in the next release.
- Fixed explanation text causing crashes on older versions of the Archipelago launcher.
- Fixed glitch where manually toggling deathlink would not in fact, toggle deathlink.
- Colorblind mode now shows the colors on guest sacrifice checks.
- Guests are now counted across all rides for shop requirements instead of being required for each. No more having 6 boat hires with 700 riders each!
- Check out this cool song! It has nothing to do with the game or Archipelago, but I think it's pretty.
v0.1.20-beta.title: Return of the Sun!

v0.1.21-beta.description:
Every time I release, I think "I'm so close to getting into core!" and every time, I'm wrong!

**This update will break old saves! Only use it on new generations and saves!
You will need to replace the old Archipelago Madness scenarios, as new rides have been added to OpenRCT2 since their original creation.**

- The unlock shop now appears in the spoiler log! 
- Added food poisoning traps! Guests holding food will have their nausea maxed out. Thanks AuGold!
- Removed icon that was technically breaking the GPL3 license. 
- When guests prefer less/more intense rides, the shop will no longer ask for requirements on rides that don't make sense, i.e. Roller Coasters won't have a minimum guest requirement when guests prefer less intense rides.
- Awards are now exclusively filler/traps.
- All scenarios now include a log flume, merry-go-round, and 2 food stalls to ensure all awards are permanently obtainable.
- The player was driven mad by High Demon Elgrim!
- The Countdown before a game starts now shows as popups instead of park messages.
- Added an in-game command to change visibility in the unlock shop mid-game.
- Locations can now go to 999 for each color instead of 99. You can put a *ton* of items into a multiworld now.
- Deathlink Popups now always sends a Deathlink, regardless of Deathlink settings.
- "Snowgrave" now changes the weather to Snow.
- Lowered the Spam purchase timeout from 2 seconds to .2 seconds.
- Updated the Tutorial to reflect new changes.
- Put flashing text to try to get people to READ THE TUTORIAL. 
- Change the prices to rides/park entrance to optional every day to cover for a glitch.
- Fixed ride list for multiple scenarios including Hydro Hills, Magic Quarters, and Gentle Glen.
- Altered Deathlink to Extend the Deathlink class. Not that this means much to the end user, but hey, at least it's consistent with other games now!
- Games sharing ItemID and LocationID spaces are now compatible with each other. Explorers of Sky will no longer screw with your Unlock shops.
- Clicking on the "Ducks" message at the very start of a game will no longer break the unlock shop.
- Awards now properly display in the Unlocked Tab.
- Fixed a bug where skips wouldn't work in certain instances.
- Furry traps now work regardless of in-game language. (#OriginalSentence)
- I wrote a new song for the Mistborn Adventure Game I'm currently playing in! I'm an Iron Puller.
v0.1.21-beta.title: Living in Potatoland (Idaho, not Ireland)
